operations.description: Identifies the required operation to be executed for a Trade Finance contract. Input of valid codes as: O for opening of LC, P for Pre-advise of LC, A for Amend LC, C for Collect Charges, D for Decision on Amendments, T for Tracer, IO for LC through Internet Banking Operation and M for Ancillary Message (MT759)

propertyId.description: The identifier of the property, being an instances of a property class, e.g. Interest is property class and Debit Interest is property

serviceId.description: This indicates the id of the TSA.SERVICE

serviceName.description: The service related to an arrangement
